about_the_game:
With this Oktoberfest DLC you will get:

Wardrobe

☑ The Dirndl
☑ Club Princess green
☑ Club Princess Purple


All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the main menu with scenes and in menu where you are making settings of the character.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.
detailed_description:
With this Oktoberfest DLC you will get:

Wardrobe

☑ The Dirndl
☑ Club Princess green
☑ Club Princess Purple


All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the main menu with scenes and in menu where you are making settings of the character.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.
name: Oktoberfest for 3D Visual Novel Maker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor like i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 4GB VRAM like GTX 970
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Create Oktoberfest 3D visual novels, comics, manga or story and became a famous novel maker
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil
